original_text:
Fruit Million
In questa bella slot della BGaming, il classico tema della frutta si fonde con quello delle api al lavoro per produrre un delizioso miele. E proprio il richiamo a questo cibo prelibato fa sì che il colore predominante del gioco sia il giallo. Infatti, dietro la griglia di gioco, ci sono dei girasoli e un vaso da cui cola un miele denso e invitante. Sulla sinistra invece c’è un’arnia, la casetta in cui questi piccoli insetti vivono e lavorano.
Come di consueto quando parliamo del provider BGaming, la consolle nella parte bassa della griglia ha pochi tasti, giusto quelli per aumentare la puntata, l’Autoplay e lo Start. Ciò non vuol dire che non ci sono altre impostazioni, semplicemente sono accessibili cliccando sul tasto dell’ingranaggio.
La musica è un motivetto divertente che accompagna gli spin, più qualche effetto sonoro a seguito delle combinazioni vincenti.
Caratteristiche della slot
La griglia di Fruit Million ha 5 rulli e 4 righe su cui si dipanano ben 100 linee di pagamento! Di base troviamo la puntata minima già impostata, 0,20 € a spin, che naturalmente può essere innalzata sino a un massimo di 15 €. Per vincere è necessario formare delle combinazioni di simboli partendo dal rullo di sinistra e procedendo verso destra.
Il tasto Quick Spin fa sì che i rulli corrano più velocemente, inoltre si possono impostare i giri automatici: se non avete volgo di tenere costantemente sotto controllo l’andamento delle vostre partite, potete impostare dei limiti superati i quali la modalità Autoplay si arresterà.
Il valore RTP si attesta su un ottimo 97,1%.
Simboli e funzionalità
Come abbiamo detto sin dall’inizio, in Fruit Million si fondono diverse tipologie di simboli. I primi, quelli che valgono meno, sono dei frutti. Troviamo ciliegie, limoni, arance, prugne, uva e anguria. Di pari valore con l’anguria c’è il ferro di cavallo, dopodiché si sale di livello con l’alveare.
Passiamo ora ai simboli speciali. Il nostro Wild è l’ape che coprendo la funzione di Jolly va a sostituire tutti i simboli eccetto lo Scatter. Ero può apparire soltanto sui rulli 2, 3 e 4. È un Wild a espansione in quanto può occupare le celle libere sul rullo aumentando le probabilità di ottenere combinazioni vincenti.
Ci sono poi due Scatter. Il primo è l’alveare ed  è uno Stacked Symbols, in quanto può espandersi a destra o a sinistra e rimanere fisso durante i giri successivi.
Il secondo Scatter è il diamante e paga indipendentemente dalle linee di pagamento.
C’è poi la funzione Gamble, che permette di incrementare l’ultima vittoria ottenuta. In questo caso, a seguito di una combinazione vincente, vedremo apparire sulla consolle due simboli: cliccando sul dollaro incasseremo la somma, se premiamo le carte da gioco la rischieremo. In questo caso apparirà una carta centrale coperta e accanto due pulsanti, black e red. Noi dovremmo cliccare su uno dei due e sperare che la carta girata corrisponda ad esso.

raw_translation.response:
Fruit Million: A Fusion of Classic Fruit Theme and Busy Bees

BGaming presents Fruit Million, an enticing slot game blending the fruity theme with the buzzing activity of bees producing golden honey. The color scheme of the game revolves around the luscious honey, with a yellow hue dominating the reels. The background consists of sunflowers and a jar of thick, inviting honey pouring down. On the left side of the grid lies a beehive, the little creatures' home and workplace.

As always, BGaming's game console features only a few buttons at the bottom of the grid, with options to increase the bet, Autoplay, and Start. However, you can still access other settings by clicking on the gear button. The music is a fun tune that accompanies the spins, complemented by sound effects following winning combinations.

Slot Features

Fruit Million's grid consists of 5 reels and 4 rows, with a stunning 100 pay lines to delve into! The game's default minimum bet is already set at €0.20 per spin but can be raised to a maximum of €15. To win, you must form symbol combinations starting from the left reel and moving to the right.

The Quick Spin button speeds up the reel spins, and you can also set automatic spins. If you don't want to keep a constant watch over your game, you can set limits beyond which the Autoplay mode will stop. Fruit Million boasts an excellent RTP of 97.1%.

Symbols and Functionality

As mentioned, Fruit Million merges different types of symbols. The low paying symbols consist of fruits: cherries, lemons, oranges, plums, grapes, and watermelon. The horseshoe has the same value as the watermelon, followed by the beehive with a higher value.

Moving on to the special symbols, the Wild symbol in Fruit Million is the bee, acting as a substitute for all other symbols except the Scatter. It can only appear on reels 2, 3, and 4, and it has an expanding feature occupying the empty cells on the reel, increasing the chances of forming winning combinations.

There are two Scatters in the game: the first is the beehive, which is a Stacked Symbol that can expand to the right or left and remain fixed in the subsequent spins. The second Scatter is the diamond and pays regardless of pay lines.

Lastly, there's the Gamble feature, allowing you to increase your last win. After a winning combination, two symbols appear on the console - clicking on the dollar sign will collect the sum, while clicking on the playing cards means risking it all. A covered central card and two buttons, black and red, appear, prompting you to select one. The hope is that the card matches the color you selected. 

In conclusion, Fruit Million is an engaging slot game with unique features and remarkable potential for big wins. Even experienced gamblers are bound to enjoy the game's fusion of classic fruit theme and busy bees.

raw_translation.response:
Fruit Million 
This beautiful slot game from BGaming combines the classic fruit theme with busy bees producing delicious honey. The predominant color of the game is yellow, paying homage to this delicacy. In fact, behind the game grid, there are sunflowers and a vase overflowing with thick and inviting honey. On the left side of the screen is a beehive, the home and workplace of these tiny insects.
As usual when it comes to BGaming, there are few buttons on the console at the bottom of the grid, simply allowing for increasing the bet, using Autoplay, and hitting Start. This doesn't mean there aren't other settings, they are simply accessible by clicking on the gear button.
The music is a fun tune that accompanies the spins, with added sound effects after winning combinations.
Slot Features
Fruit Million's grid has 5 reels and 4 rows, with 100 paylines! The minimum bet is set at 0.20 € per spin, but can be raised up to a maximum of 15 €. To win, players need to form winning combinations of symbols starting from the left reel and proceeding towards the right.
The Quick Spin button allows the reels to spin more quickly, and players can set automatic spins: if you don't want to monitor your gameplay constantly, you can set limits which will cause Autoplay mode to stop.
The RTP value is an excellent 97.1%.
Symbols and Features
As mentioned earlier, Fruit Million combines different types of symbols. The first, the lowest value, are fruits such as cherries, lemons, oranges, plums, grapes, and watermelon. The horseshoe is of equal value to the watermelon, followed by the beehive symbol.
Now, let's move on to the special symbols. The Wild symbol is the bee, which covers the Jolly symbol and subsitutes for all other symbols except the Scatter. It can only appear on reels 2,3, and 4. It is an expanding Wild as it can occupy the free cells on the reel, increasing the chances of landing winning combinations.
There are also two Scatter symbols. The first is the beehive, which is a Stacked Symbol, meaning it can expand to the left or right and remain fixed for subsequent spins.
The second Scatter is the diamond, which pays out independently of paylines.
There is also the Gamble feature, which allows players to increase their last win. After a winning combination, two symbols will appear on the console: clicking the dollar signs will cash out the sum, while selecting the card game option will risk the winnings. In this case, a covered central card will appear with two buttons, black and red. Players must click on one and hope the revealed card matches it.

response.headline: Gameplay Experience
response.content: Fruit Million is an exciting slot game that delivers an exciting gaming experience. The game boasts a 5x4 grid with 100 pay lines providing plenty of opportunities for winning combinations. Players can set their bet levels between €0.20 and €15 with a high RTP of 97.1%, ensuring a fair and enjoyable gameplay experience. The Quick Spin feature and Autoplay allow players to spin the reels quickly and sit back and relax while waiting for big wins.

response.headline: Bonuses and Special Features
response.content: Fruit Million includes a variety of bonuses and special features that make the game both fun and rewarding. The game has a Wild symbol represented by a bee which can substitute all other symbols on the reels except for the Scatter. The Wild expands to occupy any empty cells on the reels, providing a better chance of forming winning combinations. The two Scatters in the game are the beehive and diamond, with the beehive appearing as a Stacked Symbol that can expand to the left or right and remain fixed for subsequent spins. The Diamond Scatter pays regardless of pay lines, while the Gamble feature allows players to increase their last win and double their payout. Overall, Fruit Million offers a great selection of bonuses and features, making the gameplay exciting and potentially rewarding.

response.headline: Graphics and Design
response.content: Fruit Million is beautifully designed with the color scheme of the game revolving around the golden honey produced by the buzzing bees. The yellow hue dominates the reels, adorned with flavorful fruit symbols. The design is complemented by the backdrop of sunflowers and a jar of thick honey pouring down, creating a tempting appearance. The game's soundtrack is a fun tune accompanied by sound effects following winning combinations, making the game pleasurable to the ears as well as the eyes.

response.headline: Payouts and RTP
response.content: Fruit Million boasts an impressive RTP of 97.1%, which is significantly higher than most other slot games. The game's default minimum bet is already set at €0.20 per spin, allowing players with smaller budgets to enjoy the game. More significant bettors can raise their bet levels to a maximum of €15 per spin, providing the opportunity for big wins, making the game suitable for both casual and professional gamers alike.

response.headline: Compatibility and Availability
response.content: Fruit Million is available for play on all devices, including desktop computers, laptops, and mobile phones, making it accessible to players anytime, anywhere. The game's compatibility across devices ensures that players have a seamless gaming experience and can enjoy all the game's features and special bonuses on whatever device they prefer. Overall, Fruit Million is a fun and engaging slot game worth trying for both experienced and casual gamers.

Review: Fruit Million: A Fusion of Classic Fruit Theme and Busy Bees

BGaming presents Fruit Million, an enticing slot game blending the fruity theme with the buzzing activity of bees producing golden honey. The color scheme of the game revolves around the luscious honey, with a yellow hue dominating the reels. The background consists of sunflowers and a jar of thick, inviting honey pouring down. On the left side of the grid lies a beehive, the little creatures' home and workplace.

As always, BGaming's game console features only a few buttons at the bottom of the grid, with options to increase the bet, Autoplay, and Start. However, you can still access other settings by clicking on the gear button. The music is a fun tune that accompanies the spins, complemented by sound effects following winning combinations.

Slot Features

Fruit Million's grid consists of 5 reels and 4 rows, with a stunning 100 pay lines to delve into! The game's default minimum bet is already set at €0.20 per spin but can be raised to a maximum of €15. To win, you must form symbol combinations starting from the left reel and moving to the right.

The Quick Spin button speeds up the reel spins, and you can also set automatic spins. If you don't want to keep a constant watch over your game, you can set limits beyond which the Autoplay mode will stop. Fruit Million boasts an excellent RTP of 97.1%.

Symbols and Functionality

As mentioned, Fruit Million merges different types of symbols. The low paying symbols consist of fruits: cherries, lemons, oranges, plums, grapes, and watermelon. The horseshoe has the same value as the watermelon, followed by the beehive with a higher value.

Moving on to the special symbols, the Wild symbol in Fruit Million is the bee, acting as a substitute for all other symbols except the Scatter. It can only appear on reels 2, 3, and 4, and it has an expanding feature occupying the empty cells on the reel, increasing the chances of forming winning combinations.

There are two Scatters in the game: the first is the beehive, which is a Stacked Symbol that can expand to the right or left and remain fixed in the subsequent spins. The second Scatter is the diamond and pays regardless of pay lines.

Lastly, there's the Gamble feature, allowing you to increase your last win. After a winning combination, two symbols appear on the console - clicking on the dollar sign will collect the sum, while clicking on the playing cards means risking it all. A covered central card and two buttons, black and red, appear, prompting you to select one. The hope is that the card matches the color you selected. 

In conclusion, Fruit Million is an engaging slot game with unique features and remarkable potential for big wins. Even experienced gamblers are bound to enjoy the game's fusion of classic fruit theme and busy bees.

Overall, the Fruit Million slot game is not just a feast for the eyes but also brings excitement on every spin. So, are you ready to give your taste buds a treat and try your luck at spinning the reels of Fruit Million?

Gameplay and Payouts

You must form symbol combinations starting from the left reel and moving to the right to win. The Quick Spin button speeds up the reel spins, and you can also set automatic spins. Fruit Million boasts an excellent RTP of 97.1% and a unique expanding Wild feature that increases your chances of forming winning combinations.

Compatibility and Availability

Fruit Million is available on desktop and mobile devices and runs smoothly on most platforms. It is compatible with iOS and Android operating systems and can be played on most web browsers. The game is available at numerous online casinos that offer BGaming's software. Unlike some slot games, Fruit Million loads quickly and smoothly, without any lag or delay issues.

Review: Fruit Million: A Fusion of Classic Fruit Theme and Busy Bees

BGaming presents Fruit Million, an enticing slot game blending the fruity theme with the buzzing activity of bees producing golden honey. The color scheme of the game revolves around the luscious honey, with a yellow hue dominating the reels. The background consists of sunflowers and a jar of thick, inviting honey pouring down. On the left side of the grid lies a beehive, the little creatures' home and workplace.

As always, BGaming's game console features only a few buttons at the bottom of the grid, with options to increase the bet, Autoplay, and Start. However, you can still access other settings by clicking on the gear button. The music is a fun tune that accompanies the spins, complemented by sound effects following winning combinations.

Slot Features

Fruit Million's grid consists of 5 reels and 4 rows, with a stunning 100 pay lines to delve into! The game's default minimum bet is already set at €0.20 per spin but can be raised to a maximum of €15. To win, you must form symbol combinations starting from the left reel and moving to the right.

The Quick Spin button speeds up the reel spins, and you can also set automatic spins. If you don't want to keep a constant watch over your game, you can set limits beyond which the Autoplay mode will stop. Fruit Million boasts an excellent RTP of 97.1%.

Symbols and Functionality

As mentioned, Fruit Million merges different types of symbols. The low paying symbols consist of fruits: cherries, lemons, oranges, plums, grapes, and watermelon. The horseshoe has the same value as the watermelon, followed by the beehive with a higher value.

Moving on to the special symbols, the Wild symbol in Fruit Million is the bee, acting as a substitute for all other symbols except the Scatter. It can only appear on reels 2, 3, and 4, and it has an expanding feature occupying the empty cells on the reel, increasing the chances of forming winning combinations.

There are two Scatters in the game: the first is the beehive, which is a Stacked Symbol that can expand to the right or left and remain fixed in the subsequent spins. The second Scatter is the diamond and pays regardless of pay lines.

Lastly, there's the Gamble feature, allowing you to increase your last win. After a winning combination, two symbols appear on the console - clicking on the dollar sign will collect the sum, while clicking on the playing cards means risking it all. A covered central card and two buttons, black and red, appear, prompting you to select one. The hope is that the card matches the color you selected. 

In conclusion, Fruit Million is an engaging slot game with unique features and remarkable potential for big wins. Even experienced gamblers are bound to enjoy the game's fusion of classic fruit theme and busy bees.
